main event: A witness in Miami, Florida observed a silvery-white, round object about the size of a basketball in the sky on 06/15/52.
interesting points: The object seemed to have smoke or vapor rising around it and emitted 'sparks' as it gained altitude.
The object moved at a tremendous speed, estimated around 700-800 miles per hour, and made no motor noise.
The witness initially thought it was an airplane, but soon realized it was moving too fast and silently.
The object passed directly overhead at an altitude of about 2,000 feet and then disappeared from sight, going off in a northerly direction.
The witness had observed many airplanes before and was certain this was not an airplane.
